divs: Sighting DetailsI was just coming home from the store when I saw a meteor like object that disappeared and reappeared in the horizon. It started above the tree line, streaked toward the horizon at a 45 degree angle, disappeared, then reappeared taking the same path, then disappeared again before the horizon. I thought it may have been a meteor, but it flashed and didn't continue into the tree line like a normal meteor would.
Summary: Meteor like object that disappeared and reappeared.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around April 29th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
